entries.transmission_start: Mission Update: <Bombers are beginning to make their attack run.>
entries.transmission_received: Mission Update: <Bombers attacking Nym's smuggler fleet. Mission successful.>
entries.trans_update: Mission Update: <Bomber group %DI percent of the way to Nym's smuggler fleet.>
entries.title_d: Black Epsilon wants to get a crack at bombing Nym's freighters. They are heavily guarded but if you were to draw off the fighters we would be able to launch our attack. You are to begin a transmission of your presence far from the freighter fleet. You will have to remain in that area for a long time in order to get the attention of Nym's fighters. You will most likely get alot of attention but with any luck you will be able to pull the escorts away from the freighters and we can hit that fleet with our bombers.
entries.title: Lok System: Getting Nym's Attention
entries.split_quest_alert: Nym has been sent a message and it is time for you to put the period on it. Nym recieved a gift from his Rebel friends in the form of a ship. Your assignment is to destoy that ship.
entries.quest_reachpoint_d: Travel to the transmission point and wait for the broadcast to begin. With any luck Nym's fighters will be drawn to you like moths to a flame.
entries.quest_location_d: The designated transmission point will be supplied to your navigaiton computer.
entries.quest_defendpoint_d: It will take some time for the fighters guarding the freighters to receive the transmission so you will have to remain at that point until they are committed. Remain by the transmission point but you will need to defend yourself to the upmost from all the attention you will receive.
entries.outofrange_failed: Nym's pirates have called off their attack on you and have returned to protect their smuggler fleet. Operation is a failure. Report in to your superior.
entries.outofrange: You have moved out of optimum target range. Return immediately.
entries.mission_complete: Our mission was a complete success. Nym's smuggler fleet has been sustained heavy loses.
entries.found_loc: Travel to the location supplied to your navigation computer. This is far enough away that Nym's fighters will not be able to make it back to protect their freighters until it is too late.
entries.first_attack: Keep your eyes peeled. Enemy fighters are heading right at you.
entries.arrived_at_loc: Stand by at this location. Nym's pirates are on an interception course.
